description: A shard of jade that fell away from the petrified corpse of a yugg.  The edges are rounded and sinuous, and when you look at it out of the corner of your eye it almost seems to be trying to crawl away.
Blood extracted from a blank body.  It's a pale red color with none of the luster of human blood.
A strange chunk of what looks like stone in the shape of a seven-pointed star.  Its surface is smooth with thin lines in it, like driftwood, but despite that it doesn't seem to reflect any light.

A deeply disturbing ooze that seems to attempt to take on form over and over again, never quite succeeding.  The only thing it seems to manage are eyes that look around madly for a few seconds before dissolving back into the steaming gunk.
